original: Hetuṁ saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetum saññojanam dhammam paṭicca na hetu no saññojanaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuṁ ganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetum gantham dhammam paṭicca na hetu no ganthaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuṁ oghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu noogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetum ogham dhammam paṭicca na hetu na oghaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuṁ yogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu noyogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetum yogam dhammam paṭicca na hetu no yogaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuṁ nīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nonīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetum nīvaraṇam dhammam paṭicca na hetu no nīvaraṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ parāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum parāmāsam dhammam paṭicca na na hetu no parāmāsaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
